name: Digital Creature
description:
This is an interactive digital toy built in OpenFrameworks using C++ made by Nolan Sadowski.

There are 3 stats to keep track of: Health, Energy, and Money.

          Health - Depletes slowly over time. Can be restored with the food button or exercising. If health runs out, your pet will die.

          Energy - Decreases when you go to work or exercise. Increases when your pet goes to sleep. If energy is too low, your pet will be too tired to work or exercise.

          Money - Decreases when you buy food. Increases when you send your pet to work.

There are 7 buttons to interact with: Food, Work, Sleep, Exercise, Stats, Help, and Power.

          Food - Increases health. Decreases money.

          Work - Increases money. Decreases energy.

          Sleep - Increases energy.

          Exercise - Increases health. Decreases energy.

          Stats - Toggles pet stats.

          Help - Toggles in-game help menu

          Power - Toggles power on and off. Resets game.

The controls are simple, one button is all you need!

         Action Button - Mouse Click
